timeline.bodyText: Please do not return internal javac types (i.e. anything from com.sun.tools.**) from API or semi-API methods like this. It should be simply List, or something similar.
timeline.author: lahodaj

timeline.bodyText: Please no internal types inside language features (besides the language infrastructure, like java.source{.base}, etc.).
timeline.author: lahodaj

should use TokenUtilities.textEquals().
